JSR 362 Portlet Specification 3.0 Interface Working Document

This document provides the interface descriptions for the JSR 362 Portlet Specification 3.0 Working Document.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
javax.portlet
The javax.portlet package defines the API for the Java Portlet Specification V3.0.
javax.portlet.annotations
This describes a proposed extension for the JSR 362 Portlet Specification 3.0 public API to exploit CDI capabilities in portlets.
javax.portlet.filter
The javax.portlet.filter package defines the filter APIs for the Java Portlet Specification.
This document provides the interface descriptions for the JSR 362 Portlet Specification 3.0 Working Document.

The interfaces described here are not normative and are subject to change at any time.

Color coding for description changes in Version 3.0: Changed text :: Added text :: Deleted text as compared to Version 2.0.

Change History:

  • 20150806: Update for PORTLETSPEC3-54 Add Configuration Annotations for Custom Portlet Mode and Window State. Changed class: PortletConfiguration. Added annotation classes: Supports, CustomPortletMode, CustomWindowState. See for discussion.
  • 20150629: Added API proposal for injectable bean portlet objects. See: Annotations package info file.
  • 20150618: Added API proposal for an annotation-based configuration interface. See: Annotations package info file.
  • 20150225: Update for PORTLETSPEC3-50: Updated methods MimeResponse.createRenderURL()), MimeResponse.createActionURL()), MutablePortletParameters.set(), MutablePortletParameters.add(), PortletURLGenerationListener.filterRenderURL(), PortletURLGenerationListener.filterActionURL(). Added method PortletParameters.size(). See PORTLETSPEC3-50 for discussion.
  • 20150202: Updated PORTLETSPEC3-18: Updated methods PortletConfig.getPortletModes(String) and PortletConfig.getWindowStates(String). Added method PortletConfig.getPublicRenderParameterDefinitions(). See portlet configuration description.
  • 20141204: Updates for the Portlet Hub Ajax support. Updated the following data structures: PortletConstants, PortletParameters, and PortletState.
    Added the following Portlet Hub methods and members: constants, newParameters, newState.
    Added ResourceRequest#getPageState() method in support of the Portlet Hub partial action processing sequence.
  • 20140603: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-43: Renamed some methods to reduce redundancy. See: getNames(), getValue, getValues, setValue(String, String), getNames(), and setValues(String, String...).
  • 20140527: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-41: Some updates to the parameter handling proposal. See: setFragmentIdentifier, getFragmentIdentifier, append(Appendable), append(Appendable, boolean) add(PortletParameters), getNames(), and setValues(String, String...).
  • 20140526: 1st run integration of the Portlet Hub JavaScript documentation into the API description. The Portlet Hub was created using Jasmine JavaScript test cases.
  • 20140512: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-11: Integrated new parameter handling concept. Deprecated JSR 286 parameter handling methods.
    Added: Mutable, PortletParameters, MutablePortletParameters, RenderParameters, MutableRenderParameters, ResourceParameters, MutableResourceParameters, ActionParameters, MutableActionParameters, PortletState, MutablePortletState, ActionURL, RenderURL.
    Updated: BaseURL, PortletURL, ResourceURL, ActionURL, PortletRequest, ResourceRequest, ActionRequest, PortletResponse, ResourceResponse, MimeResponse, ActionRequestWrapper, ActionResponseWrapper, EventResponseWrapper, PortletRequestWrapper, RenderResponseWrapper, ResourceRequestWrapper, ResourceResponseWrapper
    Moved the following methods to RenderURL, as they are not useful on other types of URL: setFragmentIdentifier and getFragmentIdentifier

    See Diagram.

  • 20130829: PORTLETSPEC3-16: Added methods to GenericPortlet to allow annotation handling to be extended: dispatchAnnotatedActionMethod, dispatchAnnotatedEventMethod, and dispatchAnnotatedRenderMethod.
  • 20130829: PORTLETSPEC3-32: Changes in public render parameter handling on action URL. See method descriptions createActionURL() and createActionURL(ParameterCopyOption). See updated spec description portlet URLs .
  • 20130829: PORTLETSPEC3-30: Added new URL create methods to MimeResponse: createRenderURL(ParameterCopyOption) and createActionURL(ParameterCopyOption). Updated RenderResponseWrapper and ResourceResponseWrapper accordingly.
  • 20130828: PORTLETSPEC3-13: Added several methods to BaseURL: setAuthenticated, getAuthenticated, setFragmentIdentifier and getFragmentIdentifier. See portlet URLs .
  • 20130827: Added link to wiki article to resolution of PORTLETSPEC3-18.
  • 20130826: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-18: Added methods PortletConfig.getPortletModes() and PortletConfig.getWindowStates(). See portlet configuration description.
  • 20130826: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-28: Added methods ResourceResponse.setStatus(int sc) and ResourceResponseWrapper.setStatus(int sc).
  • 20130825: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-22: Changed String array parameter to vararg parameter on BaseURL.setParameter, StateAwareResponse.setRenderParameter, and PortletPreferences.setValues.
  • 20130824: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-24: Allow GenericPortlet.doHeaders to throw a PortletException or IOException.
  • 20130823: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-21: Added methods BaseURL.write(Appendable) and BaseURL.write(Appendable, boolean) to BaseURL. See Portlet URLs .
  • 20130822: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-27: Clarified ResourceRequest.getPortletMode and ResourceRequest.getWindowState behavior when the cache level is set to FULL by returning PortletMode.UNDEFINED and WindowState.UNDEFINED, respectively.
  • 20130822: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-35: Added exception and clarified description in method MimeResponse.setContentType.
  • 20130821: Colorized older changes. All changes are now colorized and linked from the change history. Uncolorized the change history.
  • 20130820: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-26: Clarifications about when header information can be set in the following methods: HTTP_STATUS_CODE, setLocale, and setContentLength.
  • 20130818: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-23: Fixed issue involving exceptions in annotated methods in GenericPortlet.java (code fix only - no javadoc changes)
  • 20130817: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-20: Clarified behavior when scope is unknown in several PortletSession methods: getAttribute, getAttributeNames, removeAttribute, and getAttributeMap.
  • 20130816: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-17: Changed method signature to allow subtypes of PortletMode in RenderResponse.setNextPossiblePortletModes.
  • 20130815: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-15: Fixed issue involving annotations in GenericPortlet.java (code fix only - no javadoc changes)
  • 20130813: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-8: Clarifications about behavior of the parameter map in StateAwareResponse.getRenderParameterMap(), BaseURL.getParameterMap(),
  • 20130730: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-9: Clarifications in the MimeResponse URL creation methods createRenderURL(), createActionURL(), and createResourceURL()
  • 20130726: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-10 and PORTLETSPEC3-25: Reworked parameter setting methods in StateAwareResponse and BaseURL to improve clarity.
  • 20130726: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-7: Clarification about setting parameters in StateAwareResponse.setRenderParameters(Map) and BaseURL.setParameters(Map).
  • 20130717: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-3: Clarification in CacheControl about getExpirationTime().
  • 20130717: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-4: Clarification in PortletRequest about getPortletSession()
  • 20130717: Resolved PORTLETSPEC3-5: Clarification in getPrivateParametermap() about private render parameters
  • 20130715: Initial version
